plot: The Fresh Beats are living toys in a magical holiday toyland! Which is great ... until Dancing Robot Twist runs out of batteries! Shout, Marina, and Kiki need to help him get his moves back.
plot_en: The Fresh Beats are living toys in a magical holiday toyland! Which is great ... until Dancing Robot Twist runs out of batteries! Shout, Marina, and Kiki need to help him get his moves back.
plot_es: The Fresh Beats are living toys in a magical holiday toyland! Which is great ... until Dancing Robot Twist runs out of batteries! Shout, Marina, and Kiki need to help him get his moves back.
title: The Fresh Beat Band
